body_text:
IMO, we should leave this and make removing it a piece of the Ant upgrade, then.
At the moment, this patch does what we need it to, given the version we're using. If a later patch is applied to update Ant, I don't see why the duties of that patch wouldn't be to also phase out things such as this. That way, the end user gets a consistent UI, both before and after the code changes.
